name: access-transit
description: A project that bridges critical gaps in transit accessibility

scripts.kickstart: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build && cd ../server && npm i && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.deploy: cd frontend && npm ci --include=dev && npx vite build && cd ../server && npm ci && npm run migrate && npx knex migrate:status
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/package-lock.json server/node_modules server/package-lock.json
scripts.restart: cd server && npm run migrate:rollback && cd ../ && npm run clean
